content.rendered:
About Maple Avenue Counseling Department

Maple Avenue Middle School offers a breadth of counseling services for students in grades 6 through 8. Services include individual and group counseling, grade transition meetings and early college preparation.

Counselors

Andrea Takacs – Red Spring  (7th and 8th Grade) – Extension: 12259
Email: a_takacs@saratogaschools.org

Joshua Muldner – Excelsior Spring (7th and 8th Grade) – Extension 12259
Email: j_muldner@saratogaschools.org

Jodie Plante – Hathorn Spring (7th and 8th Grade) – Extension: 12259
Email: j_plante@saratogaschools.org

Melissa Conyers – Columbian Spring (7th and 8th Grade) – Extension: 12259
Email: m_conyers@saratogaschools.org

Rebecca Schnorr – Excelsior and Red Spring (6th Grade) – Extension 12259
Email: r_schnorr@saratogaschools.org

Christopher Wetzel – Columbian and Hathorn Spring (6th Grade) – Extension 12259
Email: c_wetzel@saratogaschools.org
